simplified: 人往高处走，水往低处流

pronunciation.pinyin: rén wǎng gāo chù zǒu , shuǐ wǎng dī chù liú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ren2 wang3 gao1 chu4 zou3 , shui3 wang3 di1 chu4 liu2

details.simplified: 人往高处走，水往低处流
details.traditional: 人往高處走，水往低處流

meanings.value: man seeks his way up just as water seeks its way down
one should constantly strive to make progress
